issues.message: Remove or refactor this statement; it has no side effects.
Refactor this function to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 59 to the 15 allowed.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator "==".
Replace this generic exception class with a more specific one.
Remove or refactor this statement; it has no side effects.
Merge this if statement with the enclosing one.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator "<=".
Take the required action to fix the issue indicated by this "FIXME" comment.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator ">=".
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal b'/dev/sda1' 4 times.
